mapper.select: SELECT FROM AC_FUNC a, AC_FUNCGROUP b WHERE a.GUID_FUNCGROUP = b.GUID AND b.GUID_APP = #{appGuid}
SELECT FROM AC_FUNC_RESOURCE a LEFT JOIN AC_FUNC b ON a.GUID_FUNC in ${funcGuids} AND a.GUID_FUNC = b.GUID
mapper.sql: a.guid as guid ,a.guid_funcgroup as guidFuncgroup ,a.func_code as funcCode ,a.func_name as funcName ,a.func_desc as funcDesc ,a.func_action as funcAction ,a.para_info as paraInfo ,a.func_type as funcType ,a.ischeck as ischeck ,a.ismenu as ismenu
b.func_code as funcCode ,b.func_name as funcName ,a.guid_func as guidFunc ,a.attr_type as attrType ,a.attr_key as attrKey ,a.attr_value as attrValue ,a.memo as memo
